title: President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology
summary: This executive order establishes the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology (PCAST), a group of external advisors that will provide the President with advice on policy matters related to science, technology, and innovation. The order outlines the council's composition, responsibilities, and administrative details.
full_text: The order itself does not have a direct financial impact on universities like Yale. However, the advice and policy recommendations provided by PCAST could potentially influence federal funding and research priorities, which could indirectly affect the funding and operations of research-intensive universities.

university_impact_areas.name: Research Funding
university_impact_areas.description: Impacts on federal research grants, funding priorities, and research administration

university_impact_areas.name: Administrative Compliance
university_impact_areas.description: Compliance requirements, reporting mandates, and regulatory changes affecting university administration
